generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, extending into the distance, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: A paved area alongside the road, separated by a curb, is visible on the right side, which is a sidewalk.
- building: Several multi-story structures with windows and facades are visible on both sides of the street, indicating buildings.
- wall: A large, painted wall is visible on the right side of the image, adjacent to the sidewalk, which qualifies as a wall.
- fence: A metal fence is visible on the left side of the image, running along the property line of a building, which is a fence.
- pole: Vertical poles are visible along the street, supporting traffic lights and signs, which are poles.
- traffic light: A red traffic light is visible at an intersection in the distance, which is a traffic light.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible on the left side of the image, mounted on a pole, which is a traffic sign.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are visible along the sidewalks and in front of buildings, which are vegetation.
- terrain: A small patch of grass is visible in front of the building on the left, which is terrain.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast, which is sky.
- car: Multiple cars are parked along the sides of the road and one is driving in the middle of the road, which are cars.
- bicycle: A bicycle is parked on the sidewalk on the right side of the image, which is a bicycle.
